void Debug::DumpObj ( byte *  data,
size_t  len 
) [static] 

00093                                           {
00094         Debug::Log("Dumping %u bytes of object at %X\n", len, data);
00095 
00096         Debug::Log(" 00000 |");
00097         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00098                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", rem);
00099         }
00100         Debug::Log("\n\n");
00101         for(DWORD dec = 0; dec < len / 0x10; ++dec) {
00102                 Debug::Log(" %04X0 |", dec);
00103                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00104                         Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec * 0x10 + rem]);
00105                 }
00106                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00107                         byte sym = data[dec * 0x10 + rem];
00108                         Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00109                 }
00110                 Debug::Log("\n");
00111         }
00112 
00113         DWORD dec = len / 0x10 * 0x10;
00114         DWORD remlen = len - dec;
00115         Debug::Log(" %05X |", dec);
00116         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00117                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec + rem]);
00118         }
00119         for(DWORD rem = remlen; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00120                 Debug::Log(" -- |");
00121         }
00122         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00123                 byte sym = data[dec + rem];
00124                 Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00125         }
00126         Debug::Log("\nEnd of dump.\n");
00127 }

void Debug::DumpStack ( REGISTERS *  R,
size_t  len,
size_t  startAt = 0 
) [static] 

00129                                                               {
00130         Debug::Log("Dumping %X bytes of stack\n", len);
00131         for(size_t i = startAt; i < len; i += 4) {
00132                 Debug::Log("esp+%04X = %08X\n", i, R->Stack32(i));
00133         }
00134         Debug::Log("Done.\n");
00135 }

void Debug::FullDump ( MINIDUMP_EXCEPTION_INFORMATION *  pException  )  [static] 

00265                                                                {
00266         wchar_t filename[MAX_PATH];
00267         wchar_t path[MAX_PATH];
00268         SYSTEMTIME time;
00269 
00270         GetLocalTime(&time);
00271         GetCurrentDirectoryW(MAX_PATH, path);
00272 
00273         swprintf(filename, MAX_PATH, L"%s\\debug", path);
00274         CreateDirectoryW(filename, NULL);
00275 
00276         swprintf(filename, MAX_PATH, L"%s\\debug\\extcrashdump.%04u%02u%02u-%02u%02u%02u.dmp",
00277                 path, time.wYear, time.wMonth, time.wDay, time.wHour, time.wMinute, time.wSecond);
00278 
00279         HANDLE dumpFile = CreateFileW(filename, GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE,
00280                                         FILE_SHARE_WRITE | FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_FLAG_WRITE_THROUGH, NULL);
00281 
00282         MINIDUMP_TYPE type = (MINIDUMP_TYPE)MiniDumpWithFullMemory;
00283 
00284         MiniDumpWriteDump(GetCurrentProcess(), GetCurrentProcessId(), dumpFile, type, pException, NULL, NULL);
00285         CloseHandle(dumpFile);
00286 }

00064                         {

00066         if(!made) {
00067                 wchar_t path[MAX_PATH];

00070 
00071                 GetLocalTime(&time);
00072                 GetCurrentDirectoryW(MAX_PATH, path);
00073

00078                         path);

00081                         path, time.wYear, time.wMonth, time.wDay, time.wHour, time.wMinute, time.wSecond);
00082 
00083                 made = 1;
00084         }
00085 }
